properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c v3 v4 c b c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The splendor of a King, clothed in majesty Let all the Earth rejoice All the Earth rejoice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He wraps himself in light And darkness tries to hide And trembles at His voice Trembles at His voice

verse.name: c
verse.lines: How great is our God, sing with me How great is our God, and all will see How great, how great is our God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Age to age He stands And time is in His hands Beginning and the end

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The Godhead Three in One Father Spirit Son The Lion and the Lamb The Lion and the Lamb

verse.name: b
verse.lines: Name above all names Worthy of our praise My heart will sing How great is our God
